img_text: 1,306 likes meellisday Look who is our co-pilot. I don't know that I've ever flown with a woman of color as one of the pilots. This is very exciting! (Maybe I teared up with pride) Her name is Monique and she's in charge of our flight today. I love this! Yay @delta ! I hope this becomes more and more common. #femalepilot #womenofcolor #womanofcolor #blackwomen #strongwomen #rolemodel #hellyeah
